Skip to contents
ffcar 1.1.0
  • Reference

    Create APA-Style Flextable Object

    ffcar_flextable.Rd

    Function that creates an APA-style table using flextable::flextable().

    Usage

    ffcar_flextable(
  dtf_table,
  chr_header_row_1,
  chr_header_row_2 = NULL,
  chr_header_row_3 = NULL,
  lst_alignment = NULL,
  int_font_size = 11,
  chr_font_family = "Arial",
  lgc_color_rows = NULL,
  chr_row_color = NULL,
  lgc_merge_header_cells = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    dtf_table

    A data frame with the table content.

    chr_header_row_1

    A character vector matching in length to the number of columns of dtf_table, the headers for the columns.

    chr_header_row_2

    A character vector matching in length to the number of columns of dtf_table, an optional second line for the column headers.

    chr_header_row_3

    A character vector matching in length to the number of columns of dtf_table, an optional third line for the column headers.

    lst_alignment

    A named list consisting of the elements left, center, and/or right, each consisting of the column indices to apply the corresponding alignment.

    int_font_size

    An integer value, the font size for the table.

    chr_font_family

    A character string, the font family.

    lgc_color_rows

    A logical vector matching in length to the number of rows of dtf_table, specifying the rows to be colored.

    chr_row_color

    A character string giving the optional background color for rows. If no input is provided for lgc_color_rows, results in every other row being colored.

    lgc_merge_header_cells

    A logical value; if TRUE merges equivalent header cells into a single cell.

    Value

    A flextable object.

    Examples

    data(mtcars)
dtf_example <- mtcars[1:4, 1:3]
ft <- ffcar_flextable(
  dtf_example,
  c( 'Miles per gallon', 'Cylinders', 'Displacement' )
)
ft

    Miles per gallon
    Cylinders
    Displacement
    21
    6
    160
    21
    6
    160
    22.8
    4
    108
    21.4
    6
    258
